glsa.title: GNAT Ada Suite: Remote Code Execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in GNAT Ada Suite which can lead to remote code execution.

background.p: The GNAT Ada Suite is an Ada development environment.

description.p: A vulnerability has been discovered in GNAT Ada Suite. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

impact.p: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: Gentoo has discontinued support for GNAT Ada Suite. We recommend that users unmerge it:
